name: Hubzi
tag_list: marketplace, business-advertising, web-marketing, promote-services, free-classifieds, free-ads, free-job-listing, free-business-ads
overview:
Hubzi(TM) is an online marketplace for finding, buying, promoting, and selling services and products.

Hubzi.com links service consumers to vendors, businesses, freelancers, experts and service providers and offers targeted search, rapid discovery of deals, opportunities, products and services, and efficient means of comparing offerings from different providers.

Hubzi.com is ideal for small and mid-size businesses that look to market their brand and products. Many services of Hubzi are currently offered free of charge.

Hubzi.com offers different marketing plans for small and mid-size businesses. Among those plans is an introductory plan which allows business to run their own promotions and announce their discount deals. It also offers more sophisticated plans where Hubzi.com does the design and promotion of the discount deals!

Some of the features include:

â€¢Create a rich profile for your business or trade and list your products, services, references, portfolio, etc. â€¢Post deals or ads about your services and products â€¢Post any item to sell (Classifieds) â€¢Write reviews for your favorite or unfavorite brands

milestones.description: Hubzi.com supports free listings and ads for Residential Real Estate, Commercial Real Estate, and Businesses for Sale
Hubzi.com announces Partner and Affiliate Links(PALs)
Hubzi.com adds "Word Of Mouth" Marketing features
Tens of thousands of Used, Certified and New Car listings from top Dealerships are now available on Hubzi.com
